channel.title: How do I get on my server with the same IP?
channel.description: Ok wat im talking about is im using utorrent to host my server and I can only get on my server with the computer that is hosting the server My friend brang over his laptop when I try to type in my no-ip it doesnt work :confused: Is there a specail IP I need to type in or a specail way to make it work if so post your comments please If you can slove this I will love you forever :)(Not in a gay way:)) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2009, 02:49:04 pm[/size][hr]HELP ANYONE?!

item.title: How do I get on my server with the same IP?
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

uTorrent to host your server ._. ?

You have to port forward if you have a router , if not , itâ€™s your firewall .
